GSD.product_version: versions from v4.20 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
mt76: mt76x02u: fix possible memory leak in __mt76x02u_mcu_send_msg

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 3ad958bc488e3ecb0207d31621c00efb86f17482, it was introduced in version v4.20 by commit 4c89ff2c74e39b60f1f6e650721f6f92f007ea5b. For more details please see the references link.
